mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_menu ( UP_MENU_ID, ICON_CLS, PIC_URL, MENU_PATH, LEVEL, NAME, URL, DE_CODE, MENU_SORT, SYS_MENU, OPEN_TYPE, AVAILABLE, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{upMenuId}, #{iconCls}, #{picUrl}, #{menuPath}, #{level}, #{name}, #{url}, #{deCode}, #{menuSort}, #{sysMenu}, #{openType}, #{available}, #{delFlag}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
